# 5.0 Docs

> Documentation for 5.0 Docs.

*Topics available: 32*

- [Breaking change: Authentication: AzureAD.UI and AzureADB2C.UI APIs and packages marked obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/authentication-aad-packages-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Authentication: AzureAD.UI and AzureADB2C.UI APIs and packages marked obsolete
- [Breaking change: Authorization: Resource in endpoint routing is HttpContext](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/authorization-resource-in-endpoint-routing.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Authorization: Resource in endpoint routing is HttpContext
- [Breaking change: Azure: Microsoft-prefixed Azure integration packages removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/azure-integration-packages-removed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Azure: Microsoft-prefixed Azure integration packages removed
- [Breaking change: Blazor: Updated browser support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/blazor-browser-support-updated.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Blazor: Updated browser support
- [Breaking change: Blazor: Insignificant whitespace trimmed from components at compile time](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/blazor-components-trim-insignificant-whitespace.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Blazor: Insignificant whitespace trimmed from components at compile time
- [Breaking change: Blazor: JSObjectReference and JSInProcessObjectReference types changed to internal](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/blazor-jsobjectreference-to-internal.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Blazor: JSObjectReference and JSInProcessObjectReference types changed to internal
- [Breaking change: Blazor: Target framework of NuGet packages changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/blazor-packages-target-framework-changed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Blazor: Target framework of NuGet packages changed
- [Breaking change: Blazor: ProtectedBrowserStorage feature moved to shared framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/blazor-protectedbrowserstorage-moved.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Blazor: ProtectedBrowserStorage feature moved to shared framework
- [Breaking change: Blazor: RenderTreeFrame readonly public fields have become properties](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/blazor-rendertreeframe-fields-become-properties.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Blazor: RenderTreeFrame readonly public fields have become properties
- [Breaking change: Blazor: Changes to routing logic in Blazor apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/blazor-routing-logic-changed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Blazor: Changes to routing logic in Blazor apps
- [Breaking change: Blazor: Updated validation logic for static web assets](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/blazor-static-web-assets-validation-logic-updated.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Blazor: Updated validation logic for static web assets
- [Breaking change: Extensions: Package reference changes affecting some NuGet packages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/extensions-package-reference-changes.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Extensions: Package reference changes affecting some NuGet packages
- [Breaking change: HTTP: Kestrel and IIS BadHttpRequestException types marked obsolete and replaced](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/http-badhttprequestexception-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled HTTP: Kestrel and IIS BadHttpRequestException types marked obsolete and replaced
- [Breaking change: HTTP: HttpClient instances created by IHttpClientFactory log integer status codes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/http-httpclient-instances-log-integer-status-codes.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled HTTP: HttpClient instances created by IHttpClientFactory log integer status codes
- [Breaking change: HttpSys: Client certificate renegotiation disabled by default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/httpsys-client-certificate-renegotiation-disabled-by-default.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled HttpSys: Client certificate renegotiation disabled by default
- [Breaking change: IIS: UrlRewrite middleware query strings are preserved](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/iis-urlrewrite-middleware-query-strings-are-preserved.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled IIS: UrlRewrite middleware query strings are preserved
- [Breaking change: Kestrel: Configuration changes at runtime detected by default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/kestrel-configuration-changes-at-run-time-detected-by-default.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Kestrel: Configuration changes at runtime detected by default
- [Breaking change: Kestrel: Default supported TLS protocol versions changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/kestrel-default-supported-tls-protocol-versions-changed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Kestrel: Default supported TLS protocol versions changed
- [Breaking change: Kestrel: HTTP/2 disabled over TLS on incompatible Windows versions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/kestrel-disables-http2-over-tls.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Kestrel: HTTP/2 disabled over TLS on incompatible Windows versions
- [Breaking change: Kestrel: Libuv transport marked as obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/kestrel-libuv-transport-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Kestrel: Libuv transport marked as obsolete
- [Breaking change: Localization: ResourceManagerWithCultureStringLocalizer class and WithCulture interface member removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/localization-members-removed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Localization: ResourceManagerWithCultureStringLocalizer class and WithCulture interface member removed
- [Breaking change: Pubternal APIs removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/localization-pubternal-apis-removed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 where some pubternal localization APIs were removed
- [Breaking change: Localization: Obsolete constructor removed in request localization middleware](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/localization-requestlocalizationmiddleware-constructor-removed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Localization: Obsolete constructor removed in request localization middleware
- [Breaking change: Middleware: Database error page marked as obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/middleware-database-error-page-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Middleware: Database error page marked as obsolete
- [Breaking change: Middleware: Exception Handler Middleware throws original exception if handler not found](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/middleware-exception-handler-throws-original-exception.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Middleware: Exception Handler Middleware throws original exception if handler not found
- [Breaking change: MVC: ObjectModelValidator calls a new overload of ValidationVisitor.Validate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/mvc-objectmodelvalidator-calls-new-overload.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled MVC: ObjectModelValidator calls a new overload of ValidationVisitor.Validate
- [Breaking change: Security: Cookie name encoding removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/security-cookie-name-encoding-removed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Security: Cookie name encoding removed
- [Breaking change: Security: IdentityModel NuGet package versions updated](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/security-identitymodel-nuget-package-versions-updated.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Security: IdentityModel NuGet package versions updated
- [Breaking change: SignalR: MessagePack Hub Protocol options type changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/signalr-messagepack-hub-protocol-options-changed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled SignalR: MessagePack Hub Protocol options type changed
- [Breaking change: SignalR: MessagePack Hub Protocol moved to MessagePack 2.x package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/signalr-messagepack-package.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled SignalR: MessagePack Hub Protocol moved to MessagePack 2.x package
- [Breaking change: SignalR: UseSignalR and UseConnections methods removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/signalr-usesignalr-useconnections-removed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled SignalR: UseSignalR and UseConnections methods removed
- [Breaking change: Static files: CSV content type changed to standards-compliant](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/5.0/static-files-csv-content-type-changed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 5.0 titled Static files: CSV content type changed to standards-compliant
